website_summaries.verdict: All-synthetic, slip-on sneaker with soft, memory foam inner sole from manufacturer known for fashionable, quality footwear.
pros: Easy on and off, and no bending over to tie shoelaces
Comfortable, soft memory foam inner soles, mesh upper with stylish faux-leather overlays, faux laces that stay tied, contrasting-color midsole, and cool logo on side
cons: Some tendency for foot to slip out while walking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip-on
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. When I’m on call, I want to wear shoes I can slip on quickly if necessary. I don’t want to take time getting my shoes on and tied. Plus, I hate the way my feet feel restricted with tennis shoes. I’m a sandals-until-it-snows girl. I used to wear Crocs at work, but they are ugly and caused plantar fasciitis from lack of arch support. These shoes fit perfectly, are extremely comfortable, and look very nice as well. When wearing my scrubs, you can’t even tell they’re not tennis shoes. I will definitely remember this brand and product when these shoes eventually wear out or get disgusting from the OR. They are also very affordable. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, if you don't need arch support.
customer_reviews.text: ahhhhh....I love the comfort and fit of these. I'm a 9.5 and these fit PERFECTLY. Not a smiggen off! But...if you've got 'arch issues', these aren't for you. I was a little surprised to see, while they have a nice cushion, they have almost no arch support...but that isn't an issue for me, so they're just fine for slip ons. BTW, the band around the bottom, above the sole, is a light grey color.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slip on shoe for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for Christmas because she is older & has a hard time bending down to get shoes on. These are perfect for just slipping on. She said they make her feel like she is walking on a cloud so of course I had to order a pair! I love having a pair of shoes I can just slip in to run out to the mailbox. Also find I am more productive when I put on shoes so they are even helping me knock out my to do list! 🤣 My moms are black & I got the grey. Both are pretty. Definitely recommend for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: aMAMAzon

customer_reviews.title: Just ok......
customer_reviews.text: These mules are ok. The material inside is so soft that they tend to slip off my feet, especially if I have socks on and the width of my feet are average, they are not exceptionally skinny by any means. Also, the front of the shoe sits higher than the back which looks awkward. I bought these to quickly slip on to walk my dog, it's work for that purpose but if you ware going to walk up a bunch of hills do not wear sock, you will slip right out unless you have wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the "I've got to go NOW!" woman that I am
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional dog walker. I find myself kicking these on prior to walking 8 dogs, and I also slip them on around the house. Only issue is on the left one, it rubs the top of my foot a bit (I wear skechers without socks). If the left were as comfortable as the right, review would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: My Hummel OpinionTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Could not really recommend these based on the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of Skechers. All fit very well. These are just not quite as comfortable as the others. The heel does not fit as expected and sometimes rubs my heel. I am not returning them but they are not my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Delawaredeb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe, until it wasn't.  5 months fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these when I got them, but I started noticing rubbing on the bottom of my feet recently and holes in my socks. Lo and behold, there is a hole worn through on the inside of the shoe through the foam. I didn't even wear them daily, because I got a black pair of mules too and the same thing happened to them. I was a pretty faithful Skechers consumer for a VERY long time, but I'm out. Currently in contact with them, but I will have to pay to ship these to them (non-refundable) then they'll determine if they're deemed defective or not.
customer_reviews.author: Piratekitty

customer_reviews.title: Love My Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: I recently read some reports written by podiatrists that said you should not walk around on hardwood floors in bare feet or with just socks because it is too jarring on your bones and joints. I had noticed this in my new apartment as I had never had hardwood floors before. I purchased these because I have a pair of Skechers GoWalks and love them. These are easy so slip on and off around the house and the memory foam cushioning is just what the doctor ordered. I wear a 7 1/2 wide and these fit perfectly. So stylish and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen RoseTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I love skechers but was surprised I had to send back ...
customer_reviews.text: I love skechers but was surprised I had to send back 8 1/2 shoe for a size 7 1/2 because I usually wear 8 or 8 1/2 in skechers. They also are wider than I expected. I was surprised at this also because my foot is wider as I have gotten older. I do not know if I would get them again, just saying
customer_reviews.author: fred scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick shoes when you're on the go
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for running errands when you need to slip on something quickly. I've purchased shoes like these before and I love the convenience. These aren't the shoes to buy if you're looking to go walking long distances or running but I love them. These were a little bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marie P.

customer_reviews.title: When comfort is primary
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement pair for shoes I wore daily for 3 years as slippers, housework, driving, grocery shopping--in short light stuff for comfort. It fit "as expected" because I ordered the same size I already had that was a half size smaller than I generally purchase. The toe box is roomy, the shoe conforms to the foot, it does have enough arch support to make my feet happy, and I have never "walked out" of them (my running days are over). Though not recommended, I throw them in the washer and dry them in the sun. Not surprisingly, the new ones look a lot better than the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Emel Novs

customer_reviews.title: More true to size
customer_reviews.text: I went a size down based on other reviews. I tend to be a womens 8.5 and instead I ordered a 7.5. Technically they fit, but my heel is right on the edge, like right on the edge, and there isnt a ton of toe room. They are for quick nighttime dog walks when I dont want to lace up. Im sure they will stretch a little as they are worn, but I would have been much more comfortable with my true size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased your Memoryfoam Skechers Sport in both an 8.5 and 9 for wear after my recovery from surgery for a ruptured right Achilles tendon. I am unable to fit my right fit into either the 8.5 or 9 and wish to return both pairs of shoes. Please understand this was purchased before I was in recov ery from the surgery, in anticipation of a shoe putting no pressure on my ankle or hell, but this was not the case. I would like a refund back to my credit card and information for a return. You may contlact me at 215 806 8778 or pelleysbrown. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: PSB

customer_reviews.title: Shoes not made right.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were cute in appearance but the footbed was too hard & inflexible even with a memory foam liner. (which was very thin) The back of the shoes which should catch the heel was too shallow. Could walk right out of them. Can see why they only cost $30. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: ek

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have CRPS in my feet so it is very painful to walk and wear anything on my feet. These are one of the few shoes I have found that I can stand to wear for short periods and I love that I can slip them on and off easily. Lots of cushioning, which is very important for me and great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Betty barlow

customer_reviews.title: There so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes there so comfortable I’ve had bad health the last 2 years I have not got to walk that much & when I do it’s been in slippers so I’m just now starting to get my health back & walking more so I needed some good shoes these I thought would be perfect cuz I can slip them on & they have memory foam inside so there so soft & like any other shoe they was a lil tight at 1st I had to break them in but now I’m walking all over in them
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Orthotics will work!
customer_reviews.text: To those who have asked if you can put orthotics in these, you can! But, you will want to have the type that are for the full foot. Not the 3/4 size. The footbed that come in these is kind of tacky on the bottom to keep it in place, but comes out very easily. And, there is pretty much no arch support, as they come! So, if you need arch support, you need to change out the footbed. And, I find them a bit loose, but not too bad. When you replace the footbed with a good arch support or orthotic, they should work great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem pretty comfortable since there's kind a memory foam feeling sole. I do find that my heels barely fit inside the lip at the back of the shoe and I ordered my normal size. I also find there's just enough width to get my foot in and I have normal feet so I can't imagine that they'd fit well for someone with a wide foot. I only use them to slip on and off quickly to take my dog outside so I really can't say how comfortable they'd be if I wore them all day or walked a long distance with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pairs of mule shoes before, and this is the first time I've had a pair I don't like. I ordered my size, and the correct size came. I think they are too narrow up front, or shaped strangely in some way. I can get my whole foot in if I have no sock on. With socks, my heel hangs out a little. With or without socks, they don't stay on very well. They sometimes fall off on steps, or if I'm kneeling on something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bummer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wide width because i have a high instep and these were tight across my foot at the point of entry, which cut in a bit..BTW My feet aren't "fat", and althogh i have a high instep, it's not THAT crazy. There is absolutely no arch support, so instead of using these to walk in like I had hoped to do, they have become expensive house slippers. :(
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: This was supposed to be a 9.5 shoe but it's smaller than a pair of reg. 9's
customer_reviews.text: I have to start wearing open back shoes because I have some issues going on with my achilleas tendons. I had bought a nice pair of white mule Schechter tennis shoes at a size 9 and I love them. So I wanted a little different style and ordered these. They are smaller than the regular 9"s I bought. they are a low shoe and I don't care for low shoes. I was disappointed in them. To bad they didn't have the other style in black in my size.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived after said date of  9/17
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and style of the sketchers. I'm not sure how they will fit my active work schedule but I plan on testing them out. They are cushy and comfortable more so then the sneaks I wear now. The arch could use more support. I'm still adjusting to the low back and think I may need a little more material back there. I will come back when I put them to the test. I'm just happy I got them 7 days after they said they were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A comfy mule
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought Sketchers before, or mules. I was wary of what I think of as the excessively curved sole of this shoe brand, but bought them because the reviews were good and I needed a comfortable shoe that I could quickly slide my feet into before going outside. I really like these. They are very comfortable and the sole is not curvy. It is thick, but I like the memory foam padding. These are comfy and fit my needs. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, love, love these shoes!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you need more than slippers.... I love these shoes, they are SO comfortable!! I can go in and out of the house without changing shoes. When I need a quick trip to the market, these shoes do the trick. When I get home at night and need to get dinner rolling a quick change of clothes and I pop these puppies on and I'm ready to work the second shift! Gotta run the kids to school, sports practice or wherever, slide right in and I'm off! And yeah, they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Good luck...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible..never had i ordered anything from them that was made so CHEAPLY MADE...VERY disappointed...very thin material not built to last..ordered a 9 and I believe it felt like a 12! I have many other mules and sandals from them but NEVER would recommend these...JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Free

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a Well-Made shoe.  The Memory Foam Padding is Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the shoes for long, and I may have ordered it a half-size too big. But because of weather , and other considerations, I haven't had the opportunity to actually do much walking in them.. I have noticed that because of the deep grooves in the sole, that my foot sometimes catches on carpet. Also, I haven't tried them for driving yet, but those deep grooves are somewhat of a concern to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pretty, but serves the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: We just got a puppy and my life has been reduced to constant trips outside for Housebreaking, and avoiding having my toes snacked on while inside. So I needed a pair of shoes that were easy and quick to get on and would protect my toes. These shoes fit the bill. They are comfortable and fit fine but they are not attractive at all. I think I’d they didn’t have the faux laces they’d be better looking, but since I don’t plan to wear these except when walking or tending to the dog, they are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: NYMommy10

customer_reviews.title: Fit is as expected from Skechers, the Sole is extra thick and bouncy
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers arrived fast and well packed. They fit as expected, I have other Skechers and the fit is the same, perhaps cut a little higher. The soles are strange...very thick and bouncy. I have worn them and they are comfortable if different. I would not have bought them if tried on first, just because of the thicker soles which could cause tripping if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Werger

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable... which is what I was looking for. Fit great... I am a size 5 so it's a real hit or miss.. . many size 5 end up being more like a 5 1/2 . Plenty of room around the toe and sides.. no rubbing or sliding as I walk. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute summer mule sneaker but NOT for all day wear.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet a lot for work (typically 2-3 hours before sitting for a few minute break). These sneakers make my heels ache after about 40 minutes of standing. I do have light work days in late summer so I can wear them then but NOT for heavy days. I would not recommend these for people having to stand more than an hour at a time. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaT

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfy slides
customer_reviews.text: These are uber-comfortable! I am barefoot pretty much all day, walking on mostly hardwood floors. I have very dry skin in general & my heels crack and split & become very painful to walk. I got these slides to wear at home while I work, hoping to keep my heels in check! So far, so good! Even though I already had a painful split in my heel, I've worn these for 3 days now & can walk comfortably! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: erinb.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for lazy shoelacers!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these Skechers for years due to my lack of desire to lace. Works great and this is my fourth pair over time. Very comfy. Hopefully they'll keep making these since my shoelacing laziness will probably go on forever...and ever....and ever.....
customer_reviews.author: Rick’s Wife = Doodoohead ;)

customer_reviews.title: Slips off my foot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an alternative to my Easy Spirit clogs for spring. I ordered a 8-1/2 M, which was to narrow, and a 8 wide, which was wide enough but not quite long enough, I surmised that the 8-1/2 would have been too big, so I kept the 8 wide. They aren't the travel time clogs, for sure, I have to flex my toes to keep them from coming off, and my foot doesn't stay all the way into the shoe. I'd not buy this shoe again
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality from China
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Have purchased Skechers in the past and was surprised at the cheap materials and poor fit of this shoe. The sole is an ugly, stiff and thick material. Then I saw it was made in China. This must be the new material they use there as I recently returned shoes from another brand for the same reason. For many reasons, I will not purchase shoes made in China again. I wish descriptions of products online would state where items are made, and not just state "Imported". Would save money on returns.
customer_reviews.author: medinan

customer_reviews.title: Run 1/2 size too big
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep a pair of slip-on sneaks in the house for running out for quick errands or getting things out of the garage, etc. My new balance were falling apart after several years and I thought these looked cute. I didn't like them as much in person as I did in the picture. And they must run large - at least 1/2 size too big and they won't really stay on well. I'll probably keep them, but I'll shop in person next time to confirm the fit and make sure I get a pair I like.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit me well
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable toes are roomy the width is perfect and the arch support is good. I have been looking for shoes that fulfill each of these and these do I am going to order another pair ina different color. I have been having difficulty with my feet these have helped greatly
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit even though I researched -
customer_reviews.text: Have to give a less than 5 star because I couldn't even get into them. I have a high instep and they were too binding on the instep and since there's no way to 'loosen' those laces, couldn't get them on. Had to return them. HOWEVER - IF you have a non-wide foot with an 'ordinary' instep, these would be a 5 for you. They are BEAUTIFUL! Broke my heart to not be able to keep them!
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers make a wonderful shoe, I have a difficult time wearing tennis shoes I have a fairly high arch which make a normal lace up shoe uncomfortable, when sketchers made a mule style I was hooked. For sometime all I was able to find were white in mules which I have loved and wore several pairs out. When I found that they are now in several colors I was very excited, I plan on buying several different colors. They are extremely comfortable, I was out shopping and one of the store employees stopped and complemented me on them and said she also was a sketchers lover.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna K Laramy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for person with bone spurs.
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought these on my Amazon account. She has bone spurs on her feet and swears by these sneakers. They have proven to be the only comfortable sneakers she had found that do not cause the bone spurs to hurt more. They fit perfectly. They last quite a long time. Good arch support. She recommends then highly for anyone with bone spurs on the back of their feet. My mother is also my full time caregiver and is on her feet a lot. Again, these are the most comfortable shoes/sneakers she owns.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: Light and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. They are so comfortable and light. These shoes are nearly weightless. They feel very light on the pick up as my foot lifts off the ground. I like that. I also like that they are breathable, my foot does not sweat when wearing these. They are very comfortable, the air cooled memory foam feels like a cushiony cradle to my foot. These shoes may or may not last long, but I am going to wear them until they fall apart. I just may get another pair just to rotate them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa D

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7 and ordered 1/2 size up after reading some of the reviews and it was probably unnecessary. They are 1/2 size too big in my bare feet - but I do have plenty of room for winter socks, so they are fine. Super comfortable as I expected after having several previous pairs. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MTHellfire

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 7. 5 & 8. 7. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 7.5 & 8. 7.5 fit but was snug. I have worn other sketchers and decided to keep the 7.5 and they have stretched and fit well. The only issue I had was that the arches in the shoes are very pronounced. I have zero arch and my feet were quite sore after wearing them for 4 hours with a medium hig activity level walking. 5 stars....but maybe sketchers will come out with shoes for people with no arch.
customer_reviews.author: J. DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning these shoes and labeling them the most uncomfortable shoes I think I’ve ever put on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: awesome site

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shoes Ever
customer_reviews.text: The day after I received these shoes I wore them to the Washington State Fair, for the whole day. They are the best. Very comfortable. I wear them to work at the Mariners Stadium, where I am on my feet for over 8 hours. And they are absolutely the best. I would give these shoes the highest rating possible. I have recommended these to all of my co workers. And friends!
customer_reviews.author: Delshay2002

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got a 9W and they fit great. Very comfortable, soft and cushy. I have foot issues which go from swelling to pain. I can stay in these shoes pretty much all day. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice slip on shoe and I can wear them in place of my Crocs. They are more comfortable and the colors were just as pictured. Have worn them several times and they are holding up well as I was concerned from other reviews. Had a slight shipping problem but that was resolved quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: Size up if between sizes
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought an 8.5 as I waiver between an 8.5-9 in sneakers. Those were too small- heels coming off the back, so I reordered a size 9 and they are perfect. Bought them to wear as “house shoes” since diagnosed with planter fasciitis and the doctor suggested that I not go barefoot in the house. The memory foam is cushy and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gould

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! I am a sketchers lover of shoes so much that I have all of my family wearing them now and that's saying a lot. These shoes have great support and as always so comfortable you have to have them.
customer_reviews.author: TaybayTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wear them as slippers in the house because i have problem feet and i would they would not be supportive enough for me (flat feet) for walking some distance. I have the other sketchers for that! But i like them and if you have good feet, you will love them. also, they were true to size for me.
customer_reviews.author: CXC

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfy, Easy to slip on and off because there is an open back heel.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and Comfortable. This style (Mule) tennis shoe is my favorite, without a heel which makes them easy to slip on. Perfect for day today wear and running around town. Also cooler during the warmer months than a regular style tennis shoe. The cushy inner sole makes them esoecially comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ValleyLAS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear in the house. I have all tile or wood floors and they are too hard to walk around without shoes. These are great shoes for this purpose...
customer_reviews.author: MintHill

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: loose stitching issue
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Love these shoes. Very comfortable and cute. However, the stitching on the back heel has unraveled and the fabric edge of the shoe is coming off resulting in an uncomfortable and ugly shoe. This is the second pair I’ve had and the same issue has happened twice. Unfortunately, I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium since that is what I always wear, but it is much too narrow. I have other Sketchers that I have worn in medium so I was surprised that this style seemed so small. They look nice so I gave one extra star, but they don't feel nice at all. I noticed when I ordered that all of the wide widths were sold out, so I guess there was a good reason for that! I will be returning them. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are more like indoor/outdoor slippers because of the materials
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and the sizing is accurate but I returned them because there is absolutely no arch support or durability. Overall, these shoes are more like indoor/outdoor slippers because of the materials. The sole is a lightweight plastic foam, not rubber like a typical sneaker, and the upper is a soft flexible neoprene that lacks stability to hold its shape. Again, great as an indoor slipper though too expensive for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: Too wide, as others have noted. This is really a problem with mules / slip ons, so I had to return them. Disappointing as I would have liked them if I could have kept them on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderReader

customer_reviews.title: The best fit!
customer_reviews.text: Skechers are true to size, thats why i stick with there brand! I have order other shoe brand from other companies, and they are not True to size! Thanks to Amazon for always having everythg i need and want!!!! Fast great service! I definitely recommend Skechers To all ages, and of course boots should always b a half size larger than your shoe size! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Super confortable and wide width is very wide
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace two other pairs that were degrading after years of constant use. I got the wide instead of normal because I needed a pair just as house slippers. They were too big until the shoes formed to my feet, about a half hour of wear. I can't recommend these shoes enough. The normal width will stretch to a fairly wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Gem Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I take these with me when I travel to Thailand. Easy to slip out of when on my long flight and in Thailand you don't wear shoes in the house; just slip out of them and enter and easy to slip back on when you go outside. Not for serious walking or rocky surfaces since there is no support. I would buy again.....this is my 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: bammie21

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what they want
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart and had to re sew the heal to ware.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoes, but after 5 hours on my feet at work, my feet were killing me. I will use the sneakers for other than work. If your going to be on your feet all day, I wouldn't wear these.
customer_reviews.author: anna weikel

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last long with Light use
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes at first. Mostly wore them around the house. I’m only giving them 3 stars because after only wearing them around the house for about 1.5 years the soles of the shoes are falling apart. Very disappointed. The last sketchers slip on tennis shoes I had last years.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Wear
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on and off, very comfortable and nice looking with the stay tied feature of these shoes. I hate having to deal with laces on any shoe, these are just right to slip on and off. First ones I ordered were a little big so I went down a half size and they fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SHOES!!! So comfortable. I love Skechers & have 3 pairs but not this style. Would love to have this style in Navy & taupe. I bought a size 8. I usually wear a 7 1/2 in other shoes but always buy an 8 in Skechers. Fit is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: vcs5199

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why Sketchers has decided that everyone's foot has gotten wider! I didn't need yet another Sketcher shoe that wants to fall off as I walk. So suddenly I need to order narrows??? Sent back and I will find another brand. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: COMFY SHOE
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of this style. They are a different from the first and I was afraid they would not wear the same. The only thing so far that I noticed is the width of the toe area. It's not as wide. I'm glad I ordered a half size larger. This appears to compensate for that. I do wish they would make the shoes identical to previous ones so we aren't disappointed with them and have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes and service
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived on time and as expected. The size runs only slightly larger and is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri W.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes. Unfortunately the heel was not high enough for me, but they have support for the average foot. Was sorry I had to return them, but gave a 5 star rating because of the appearance and quality
customer_reviews.author: Bettay K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers fit me perfectly. In fact, I have purchased 3 pairs of No Limits Slip-Ons because they are so comfortable. My feet suffer from extreme joint pain. I can wear a few styles of Skechers and Abeo open-top sandals. Since my shoe selection is limited, I buy the same shoes that I know I can wear rather than purchasing shoes I can't wear and donating them.
customer_reviews.author: Henhenk

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but a bit large
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and very bright. I always wear a 7 and these are a bit longer on my foot than I am used to, so I think they run a bit large. I was a little surprised by the brightness of the ribbons - pretty, but very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: Love the design I've been waiting a pair of tennis shoes that I can slip on but unfortunately cease I can walk right out of them which have had other slip on tennis shoes that fit perfectly but I'll go ahead and use these for just maybe lounging my patio
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe design could be better
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that was slipper like, but could be worn outside. This is a great shoe for that. The only problem I have is that there is a tiny lip behind your heel so if this shoe doesn't fit perfectly on your foot, it could be irritating on your heel. My foot fit up against the lip, but if I have on socks it pushes my foot up onto the lip. So just be aware of that. Otherwise a comfortable shoe. Also, there is no arch support so I wouldn't recommend to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit.
customer_reviews.text: The base is comfy, but I always get a size 10, to insure I have a little extra width, but these seem a bit short. The back presses into the bottom of my heel more than I could have anticipated. I still wear them though.
customer_reviews.author: Sadystika

customer_reviews.title: Fit good-Feel good
customer_reviews.text: I love these Sketchers! I ordered a half size larger than I usually wear as my left foot was swollen and I needed a shoe with an open back as I had to have a skin graft in the area of my Achilles’ tendon. The swelling is gone & I can wear regular shoes, but they are still my favs.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Scores Again!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I ever buy anything but Skechers for casual shoes. I love every pair I get and have for years. This pair lived up to my now high expectations, and the style is colorful and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: djmurray

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: First time to try Skechers. They're pretty neat. Would try their other styles but how these are in a wide. I have walked around city and on All the rave about Skechers? Bought my first pair thought they were going to be great until two months of wear they developed a hole in top left toe! Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Siciliangirl

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a chubby foot and I have to jam my feet in these to not slosh out the back. That being said, my last pair from another maker got stretched out and sloppy - big, so I sized this purchase to make up for that. They stay on my feet and have the mule style I love for ease of on-off and for staying away from the back of my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: lkw

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable in a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely wonderful, love love love them as they are comfortable. I am mediately ordered another pair in a different color. I only submit reviews on products if I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Luc

customer_reviews.title: My new #1 brand
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very well made, I live in the things. I bought a pair of a cheaper line of Sketchers which made me sure... this line is the one I will get in the future. It does run a tad bit short, but not to the point of being uncomforable. For years I wore a different brand, but can't get them anymore so was reluctant to switch, but very glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. The fit is perfect. They aren't tight and the memory foam feels so good. So easy to put on and take off. I love the look of them too. So pretty with the pastel colors on top of the shoe. These are my new favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Already ordered my 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and after wearing them for 10 minutes, I bought another pair. Skechers has the habit of discontinuing shoes that I love, and since these fit perfectly (I got US 8M), there was no break-in time at all, they just fit and feel great, figured I better get another pair before they're gone.
customer_reviews.author: Morro Bay

customer_reviews.title: runs half size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it runs half a size small. I ordered my size, 9.5 and was walking on the rim of the shoe. Shoe looks cute, but unfortunately I can't wear them
customer_reviews.author: ZOEYLOVESTOSHOP

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Pair!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mule sneakers! They are so comfortable and easy on and off when going in and out of the house! I've tried other brands and styles, but I keep coming back to these!
customer_reviews.author: Uluru03

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to slip on.
customer_reviews.text: They are attractive and easy to slip on. I need custom made insoles and was able to use them in these shoes. I ordered my usual size in wide width and they are wider than I expected which makes them quite loose. They have enough shock absorbency to walk in very comfortably. I would order them again but in regular width.
customer_reviews.author: radiant1

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear in place of my flip flops now that the weather is cooling down a smidge and my toes get cold. I love them. They are super comfortable and a good minimalistic design.
customer_reviews.author: Seymour Butts

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I found the shoes difficult to walk in. They tend to fall off my feet, and the little piece that goes around the back is uncomfortable. I wear them only occasionally when the great deal of walking is not required. I sized down one whole size from other Sketchers to keep them on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Louisisna

customer_reviews.title: Not great to walk with
customer_reviews.text: Bought those for travel. I've have slip on sneakers and I like how easy the are to take on and off at the airport. These were a bit narrow for me, then the insole is covered in very slippery fabric, so my foot slips backward with every step. I ended up buying grips to help along, but after a full day of trying I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Yaira Resto

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to slip on-and-off to bring the kids to school when it's colder out and I can't wear flip-flops and I really like them! They are cute and comfortable! Will be getting my Mom a pair as well!
customer_reviews.author: A. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Exactly what I was looking for! They seem to run a bit small as i typically wear a size 9 or 9.5 and had to order a size 10 but besides that, I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: AGregory

customer_reviews.title: They mean wide
customer_reviews.text: Very good - but seriously wide. It's a great fit now but I'm wondering if it will become too loose with wear. In the meantime, I'm grateful for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clown Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn a size 8.5 M and have Skechers in my closet this size. However these 8.5 M fit like clown shoes. What's up with this? I ordered a whole size down because I liked the shoes, thus the 3 stars, to a 7.5 and still too big. Have they changed the sizing on shoes these days?
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I’m 8 months pregnant and needed to switch to slip ons. These are super comfy. I do wish they came in wide though because my feet are continuing to swell and could probably use the extra room but for now they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: These were great, I was looking for a quick sneaker/slipper to wear and be comfortable in. These definitely fit the bill, worth every penny I would buy them again thats for sure. They are like walking on clouds. The insole is great memory foam and comfortable very cushiony!
customer_reviews.author: Destinys Chyld

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this shoe. It fell apart after only 6 months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Gomez

customer_reviews.title: They're a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my mother and myself. We both love them. Very lightweight, the memory foam is comfy, and our feet aren't slipping around inside the shoe without socks on. Another plus- the shoe breathes. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: Worked for what I needed them for
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the memory foam in shoes, nor Sketchers and even less when the 2 are together. However, I needed a pair like this and these worked for what I needed. Not the best. Somewhat small bc the memory foam flattens with more use. I have a wide foot and with socks these were not easy to wear at first.
customer_reviews.author: SweetEssence7

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Fit
customer_reviews.text: I've got two pages of Skecher orders from Amazon. I've loved them all until now. These are just a smidge too narrow and a smidge too short. They are too tight to wear with socks and too slippery to wear without.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work for me
customer_reviews.text: Like the streamed look vs chunky looking mules. Slightly large but with arch insert they are fine. Were delivered on time. Were comfortable right away. No break in time
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the leather shoes they used to make better!
customer_reviews.author: sharon kerekes

customer_reviews.title: Skechers light weight slip on shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very light, comfortable shoes. I bought these because I was getting my hip replacement and you can't wear slippers in the hospital. I wear these every day now and will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe, but it was too big. I wear an 8 in New Balance, but only need a 7.5 in Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eppley

product_meta.title: Skechers Sport Women's No Limits Slip-On Mule Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Skechers memory foam

Skechers is an award-winning global leader in the lifestyle footwear industry that designs, develops, and markets lifestyle footwear that appeals to trend-savvy men, women and children. The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women.
feature_bullets: Slip-on sneaker with mesh upper featuring faux-leather overlays, contrast midsole, and "S" logo at side
